title: Timeless Ruby Floral Vaddanam Studs - Kempu Mogga Tholakalu
features: Classic floral stud design. Features a central, square-cut ruby embraced by a radiating halo of shimmering Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones set in a delicate filigree pattern. Secured with a reliable screw-back mechanism.
occasions: or as a graceful accent to traditional attire for occasions like Diwali celebrations or festive gatherings.
description: Radiant and Versatile: These studs effortlessly blend traditional charm with contemporary wearability. The high-quality ruby adds a touch of regal color, while the CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle. The durable gold setting ensures lasting beauty and a timeless appeal.
